description.english: Find a picture of the church
I will check every drawer! Even this one! Little Airem!
Find two strange statues (before solving the puzzle)
Find picture of a seaside and...
Find a metal door, before you open them
Find the canvas before solving the puzzle (electric room)
Find a green book (Only 3% of people in the world can get it)
Open the door to the electric room
Open the door to a small room (office)
Open the door to the room with the machine
Be like a hacker, break the code (first panel).
You are the heir. House is yours ... along with the ghosts.
